title: Jhin Infinity Edge vs Essence Reaver second item. Discuss!
body:
It keeps bothering me, how a second IE is the new meta build for Jhin when from what I can see ER just offers more for 200G less. 
I feel like I'm missing something. 

Going for a second IE you're getting 10AD more than you would with ER and that's it, while
by grabbing an ER you do get 10AD less but imo the 20% CDR and the decent mana regen 
when running low more than makes up for that. On top of which you spend 200G less.
The only upside I see in getting the second IE is the fact  that you will be sitting on a B.F.Sword
until you finish the item. Although, caulfield's isn't bad either. Not to mention the waste of
value from the IE passive.

Looking forward to hearing your opinion on the matter.
